mapper.insert: insert into `order` (order_id, user_id, shop_id, good_id, purchase_quantity, total_price, good_name, good_option, order_status, address, tel_number, buyer_name) values (#{orderId},#{userId},#{shopId},#{goodId},#{purchaseQuantity},#{totalPrice},#{goodName},#{goodOption},#{orderStatus},#{address},#{telNumber},#{buyerName})
mapper.select: select order_id, user_id, shop_id, good_id, purchase_quantity, total_price, good_name, good_option, order_status, address, tel_number, buyer_name from `order` where user_id = #{userId} order by order_id desc

select order_id, user_id, shop_id, good_id, purchase_quantity, total_price, good_name, good_option, order_status, address, tel_number, buyer_name from `order` where shop_id = #{shopId} order by order_id desc
mapper.update: update `order` set order_status = order_status + 1 where order_id = #{orderId}
